title: Easy way out
creator_credit: Sherman Beck, Temple Stemm and ACI Films
brief_description: Demonstrates the need for a constructive approach to drugs and alcohol. Through a novel analogy between the physical effort needed by chicks to hatch from eggs and the psychological effort needed by adolescents to mature, the viewer learns that struggle develops strength.
